name: Detail
description:
Note: there is full tutorial in the game, but it failed to explain that you can rewind multiple times by holding R longer.

You control the Detail of the Spaceship torn apart in a crash, and your short adventure leads you back to restore Ship's mobility and continue your travel through galaxy. Luckily, Ship's batteries spilled energy all around you, but you'd better bring back as much of it as possible... 

This game was created entirely during 48 hours of Game Makers Toolkit game jam. 

Ivan Pensionerov - code/design 
Lyubov Ivanova - art 
Igor Vayman - music/sound FX
